detaileddescription.para: Defines the behaviour of frame allocation.
Main Vulkan context, allocated as AVHWDeviceContext.hwctx. All of these can be set before init to change what the context uses
Defines the behaviour of frame allocation.
Allocated as AVHWFramesContext.hwctx, used to set pool-specific options

Allocates a single AVVkFrame and initializes everything as 0.
Must be freed via av_free()
Returns the optimal per-plane Vulkan format for a given sw_format, one for each plane. Returns NULL on unsupported formats.

Returns an array of optional Vulkan instance extensions that FFmpeg may use if enabled.
Must be freed via av_free()

Returns an array of optional Vulkan device extensions that FFmpeg may use if enabled.
Must be freed via av_free()
For user-allocated pools, AVHWFramesContext.pool must return AVBufferRefs with the data pointer set to an AVVkFrame.
